statements: SELECT * FROM constituent_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, constituent_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM constituent_feedback;
SELECT constituent_name, feedback_text FROM constituent_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM constituent_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT constituent_name, feedback_text FROM constituent_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%improvement%';
SELECT * FROM constituent_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM constituent_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT constituent_name, feedback_text FROM constituent_feedback WHERE feedback_date <= NOW();
SELECT * FROM constituent_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT constituent_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM constituent_feedback GROUP BY constituent_name;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_data WHERE constituent_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';
SELECT feedback_id, constituent_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_data ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT decision_title, decision_description FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440002';
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = '12345'
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_data WHERE constituent_id = '98765'
SELECT feedback_id, constituent_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_data
SELECT decision_title FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date DESC
SELECT * FROM feedback_data JOIN policy_decisions ON feedback_data.constituent_id = policy_decisions.decision_id
SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data ORDER BY submitted_date DESC;
SELECT constituent_id, fullname, email FROM constituent_data WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT decision_id, decision_title FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 1
SELECT feedback_text, submitted_date FROM feedback_data WHERE constituent_id = 10 ORDER BY submitted_date DESC
SELECT fullname, email, address FROM constituent_data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT * FROM feedback_data JOIN constituent_data ON feedback_data.constituent_id = constituent_data.constituent_id
SELECT decision_title, decision_desc, decision_date FROM policy_decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date ASC
SELECT * FROM feedback_received;
SELECT constituent_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback_received ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM constituent_details WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT priority_id, priority_name FROM policy_priorities WHERE priority_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000');
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment, analysis_result FROM feedback_analysis ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_received;
SELECT constituent_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_received WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT constituent_id, first_name, last_name FROM constituent_details ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT priority_name, priority_description FROM policy_priorities WHERE priority_id IN (SELECT feedback_id FROM feedback_analysis WHERE sentiment='positive');
SELECT feedback_text, analysis_result FROM feedback_received LEFT JOIN feedback_analysis ON feedback_received.feedback_id = feedback_analysis.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey_responses;
SELECT response_id, respondent_name FROM feedback_survey_responses ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT feedback FROM feedback_survey_responses WHERE LENGTH(feedback) > 100;
SELECT * FROM feedback_categories WHERE category_name = 'Customer Support';
SELECT issue_title, issue_description FROM policy_issues WHERE LENGTH(issue_description) < 200;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey_responses;
SELECT respondent_name, feedback FROM feedback_survey_responses WHERE response_id = 1;

SELECT f.respondent_name, c.category_name FROM feedback_survey_responses f INNER JOIN feedback_category_mapping m ON f.response_id = m.feedback_id INNER JOIN feedback_categories c ON m.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM priority_list ORDER BY priority_title ASC;
SELECT issue_title, issue_description FROM policy_issues WHERE issue_id = 2;
